title: Cloud Identity-Aware Proxy
description: Controls access to cloud applications running on Google Cloud Platform.

iap_getIamPolicy.title:
Gets the access control policy for an Identity-Aware Proxy protected
resource.
More information about managing access via IAP can be found at:
https://cloud.google.com/iap/docs/managing-access#managing_access_via_the_api
iap_getIamPolicy.description:
Gets the access control policy for an Identity-Aware Proxy protected
resource.
More information about managing access via IAP can be found at:
https://cloud.google.com/iap/docs/managing-access#managing_access_via_the_api

iap_setIamPolicy.title:
Sets the access control policy for an Identity-Aware Proxy protected
resource. Replaces any existing policy.
More information about managing access via IAP can be found at:
https://cloud.google.com/iap/docs/managing-access#managing_access_via_the_api
iap_setIamPolicy.description:
Sets the access control policy for an Identity-Aware Proxy protected
resource. Replaces any existing policy.
More information about managing access via IAP can be found at:
https://cloud.google.com/iap/docs/managing-access#managing_access_via_the_api

iap_testIamPermissions.title:
Returns permissions that a caller has on the Identity-Aware Proxy protected
resource.
More information about managing access via IAP can be found at:
https://cloud.google.com/iap/docs/managing-access#managing_access_via_the_api
iap_testIamPermissions.description:
Returns permissions that a caller has on the Identity-Aware Proxy protected
resource.
More information about managing access via IAP can be found at:
https://cloud.google.com/iap/docs/managing-access#managing_access_via_the_api
